name: Wux Blog Editor
author: Jurre de Klijn

sections.description:
This is a plugin to manage all your posts and pages from all websites from 1 website.

The only thing that u have to do is add the plugin code that u can find on the wordpress website on the management website (https://blog.tool.wux.nl/).
On this website u can manage everything.
sections.installation:
Simply install as a normal WordPress plugin and activate.

Make an account at (https://blog.tool.wux.nl/).
Make a company.
Add your website.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Release of the plugin

1.1

  • Fixed an issue not being able to remove the image from a blog
  • Fixed an issues where images were not displayed correctly

1.2

  • Added external autologin

1.3

  • Made a new option to add scripts from blogtool

1.4

  • Added the ability to choose which post types u want to display in the blogtool

1.5

  • Added the ability to choose which post types u want to make posts for

1.6

  • Added a pagination like system for the blog index page
  • Added a url to get the current plugin version
  • Added the ability to put blogtool shortcodes in pages

1.7

  • Removed www. from variable in shortcodes
  • Added option to preview concept posts

1.8

  • Bug fixes

1.9

  • Fixed preview thumbnail

2.0

  • Added new text if autologin doesnt redirect
  • Added a fallback route for posts (if put or delete doesnt work)
  • Exploring ability of an auto updater

2.1

  • Fixed external plugin updater

2.2

  • Fixed external plugin updater REAL

2.3

  • Fixed shortcode to load in on the correct location on a page
  • Added option to insert images with alt and titel attributes

2.4

  • Fixed external plugin updater REAL REAL

2.5

  • Updated maxblogs system

2.6

  • fixed autologin

2.7

  • added functions for the generator

2.8

  • added functions for the generator image system
  • added extra way to upgrade plugin

2.9

  • added new way to upload images

3.0

  • Fixed problem for sites that dont have allow_url_fopen enabled and want to upload images

short_description: Plugin to add, edit all posts and pages from different websites on 1 website.
